{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=VZW-AC1300 |revision=(Verizon) |fcc_date=07/19/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |availability=dismissed |type=wireless router, mesh node |fcc_id=MSQ-RTACHQ00 |pcb_id=141411220010J |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018;Q, IPQ4018, 0VV, NK712CV9, K071200; |cpu1_cspeed=710 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58CVG0S3HRAIG |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L1606EM2I-12G |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646F-BYK0 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018;Q, IPQ4018, 0VV, NK712CV9, K071200; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018;Q, IPQ4018, 0VV, NK712CV9, K071200; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075;Q, QCA8075, 0VV, PK711C9H, K071101; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amp Module;Richwave;RTC6649E;026, 49EX, C719;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85736-11;85736-11, 007330.1, 1717 MX;2; ,,, Bluetooth 4.0 + HS Chip;Atheros;AR3012-BL3D;Atheros, AR3012-BL3D, FK7065JS, 1706 TW;1; ,,, 9-Channel LED Lighting Driver;Texas Instruments;LP5523;;1; |flags=Wave2, 256QAM, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.0, LED, |stock_os=Linux;3.14; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=vzw_xxx }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Verizon Mesh Router}} "P/N: 141411220010J REV:0A2" is silkscreened on the board. :This matches [[Arcadyan]] conventions. Model names included in the FCC Model Names Confirmation Letter :or various Test Report documents: *VZW-AC1300 ([[:Category:Verizon|Verizon]] [https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin.ng/blob/master/README.TXT VRZ-AC1300]) *VZMESHROUTER (VZMESHWAR) {{WiFiCert|WFA74201|01/04/2018}} {{see also|ASUS Lyra Mini|Arcadyan}} '''Note:''' [[ASUS]] requested dismissal of the application for FCC approval with FCC filings available on 7/19/2018 saying, ''"For business reason, we have no plans to sell the device in the short term."'' and ''"We conﬁrmed this device (FCC ID: MSQ-RTACHQOO) has not been sold or marketed in the US and anywhere, i.e., in any country before. Due to this reason, we will like to dismiss this FCC ID."'' ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info • >> . |
###########################################################################
# Qualcomm Atheros little-endian ARM platform, linux-3.14.x
# SOC: IPQ401x
# Valild option for BOOT_FLASH_TYPE are shown below:
#	SPI, NAND

export VZW-AC1300 := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y SSH=y QCA=y IPQ40XX=y PARENTAL2=y YANDEXDNS=y 
 VPNC=y EMAIL=y OPENVPN=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y EBTABLES=y AUTODICT=y BUILD_NAME="VZW-AC1300" 
 NVRAM_64K=y TUNEK="n" OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y ODMPID=y BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI MDNS=y FINDASUS=y 
 TEMPROOTFS=y DEBUGFS=y CFGSYNC=y USB="USB" XHCI=y NOTIFICATION_CENTER=y WLCEVENTD=y 
 REDIRECT_DNAME=y \
	UBI=y UBIFS=y WPSMULTIBAND=y \
	LP5523=y BT_CONN=y SINGLE_SSID=y \
	ATF=y QCA_TW_AUTO_BAND4=y STAINFO=y JFFS2USERICON=y HIVE_LIB=y HIVE_BIN=y \
	WIFICLONE=y QCA_VAP_LOCALMAC=y PSISTLOG=y LYRA_HIDE=y DUAL_BACKHAUL=n 
        ETHBACKHAUL=n
}} __NOTOC__ [[Category:Verizon]]
